channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why should I tip servers who earn $20 an hour?
item.description: “It seems the whole point of tipping was to make up for low wages, and that is no longer an issue.”

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Spotify says it paid $10 billion in royalties in 2024 — but are artists any better off?
item.description: The music-streaming giant has long been the target of criticism from artists about paltry payments, but said it doled out record royalties last year.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Rocket-Redfin deal could make home buying more convenient — and more expensive
item.description: One of the biggest mortgage lenders in the U.S. said it would pay $1.75 billion to buy a well-known real-estate brokerage. The deal, once it goes thro...

item.title: Motorcycles, whiskey, gum: How the E.U. is targeting U.S. products with retaliatory tariffs
item.description: The European Union is planning new tariffs on a wide range of U.S. imports next month in response to President Donald Trump’s new taxes on imported al...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Roomba vacuum maker iRobot warns it may go bust, sending stock down 30%
item.description: After its latest financial figures were worse than forecast, the company said there’s “substantial doubt” it can survive another 12 months.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
